Installation

The following section outlines the installation guide of the DCActivity module.

Python 3.6 or higher is required

discord.py V1.5.0 or higher is required


  • Install using pip:

    • # Windows
    python -m pip install dcactivity

    # macOS/Linux
    python3 -m pip install dcactivity

  • Git clone from Github:

    • $ git clone https://github.com/AkshuAgarwal/dcactivity.git
    $ cd dcactivity
    $ python setup.py install
